text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS ROG GL503VD-DB71 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 16 GB Memory 1 TB SSHD (8 GB SSD Cache) Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. The fan noise is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Had several issues with the ASUS ROG GL503VD-DB71 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 16 GB Memory 1 TB SSHD (8 GB SSD Cache) Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop since day one. performance throttles under load and the build material feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the port selection on the ASUS ROG GL503VD-DB71 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 16 GB Memory 1 TB SSHD (8 GB SSD Cache) Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

The ASUS ROG GL503VD-DB71 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 16 GB Memory 1 TB SSHD (8 GB SSD Cache) Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for competitive gaming, but the fan noise could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

The ASUS ROG GL503VD-DB71 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 16 GB Memory 1 TB SSHD (8 GB SSD Cache) Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the screen brightness could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
